locations.name: Florence
locations.description: The starting point of the tour, known as the cradle of the Renaissance, offering iconic art, history, and charming Florentine experiences.

locations.name: Chianti Hills (Countryside near Greve/Radda)
locations.description: The central part of the retreat, likely staying in a rural farmhouse or villa amidst vineyards. This area represents the quintessential Tuscan countryside experience with wine tasting, cooking classes, and relaxation. Coordinates are approximate for the Greve in Chianti area as a central point.

locations.name: Siena
locations.description: The concluding location, a historic Gothic city famous for its Piazza del Campo, medieval streets, and rich cultural heritage.
